title: Diocese Pilgrimage Month
description: Join the annual pilgrimage across Bohol's heritage churches! Experience the spiritual journey through centuries-old churches and discover the rich history of faith in Bohol.

title: Heritage Churches Conservation Workshop
description: Learn about preserving our sacred heritage sites. Workshop includes lectures on restoration techniques, conservation practices, and community involvement in heritage preservation.

title: Youth Faith Formation Retreat
description: A spiritual retreat for young Catholics to deepen their faith and connection to our church heritage. Includes workshops, prayers, and cultural activities.

title: Baclayon Fiesta Mass
description: Annual fiesta mass and procession at St. Michael the Archangel Church. Join us for a celebration of faith, community, and cultural heritage.

title: Loboc Church Historical Tour
description: Special guided tour highlighting the historical significance of Loboc Church. Learn about its architecture, artifacts, and role in Bohol's religious history.

title: Christmas Concert Planning Meeting
description: Planning meeting for the annual Christmas concert featuring choirs from heritage churches across Bohol. All parish coordinators are invited.

title: Morning Prayer Service
description: Join us for morning prayers and reflection in our beautiful heritage church. A peaceful start to your day with the community.

title: Church Restoration Update Meeting
description: Updates on ongoing restoration projects across Bohol's heritage churches. Financial reports, progress updates, and community involvement opportunities.

title: Talibon Diocese Pastoral Assembly
description: Annual assembly for all parishes under the Diocese of Talibon. Discussion on pastoral care, community outreach, and diocesan initiatives.

title: Northern Bohol Churches Festival
description: Celebrating the churches of northern Bohol with cultural presentations, historical exhibits, and interfaith dialogue.

title: Catechist Training Workshop
description: Training workshop for catechists in the Diocese of Talibon. Focus on modern teaching methods and spiritual formation.
